entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with the latest information and updates on COVID-19 from experts, journalists, health authorities and other trusted sources from around the world. For more on COVID-19, visit: twitter.com/explore/tabs/covid-19

text: @realDonaldTrump You hit the campaign trail predicated on Coronavirus accomplishments! Wrong choice Donald, very wrong choice. You have no successes.None!The virus is farfar from being contained and youare now responsible for over 65,000 American death’s. People dead because of your incompetence!
